hero.description: Premium card: Glory to all we see, glory to all he is, glory to everyone who will try to escape him.

cards.name: Winterfell
cards.description: Premium card: All is white. My mouth is frozen and I must scream.
Standard card: A drink can always be served, with the blood of his enemies.
cards.name: Berserker

cards.description: Premium card: Fear him. Your last breath is now.
cards.name: Berserker
Winterfell
cards.description: Standard card: The days are cold and so are we. We hope we can close our eyes again.
Premium card: Nobody suspects an outcast, not even the Gods.
cards.name: The Cursed One

cards.description: Premium card: His presence is not known even by ghosts, success at all costs.
cards.name: Sentinel

cards.description: Standard card: Thrown from the highest cliff, revenge will be his glory.
cards.name: The Cursed One
Heart Hound
cards.description: Premium card: Your mind is ours. Your body is ours. Stop begging.
Standard card: Death incarnate. No better time to die than now.
cards.name: The Ripper

cards.description: Premium card: Nobody suspects an outcast, not even the Gods.
cards.name: The Cursed One

cards.description: Premium card: Insanity is always an option, now it is an absolute.
cards.name: Miraj
Winterfell
cards.description: Standard card: The days are cold and so are we. We hope we can close our eyes again.
Premium card: The will of Gods has been spoken, obey and you shall be saved...or not.
cards.name: Disciple

cards.description: Premium card: Ravished by the winds of hell, no soul is to be forgiven.
cards.name: The Ripper
